thread.title: Maura Ashe

author: Maura Ashe
title: Maura Ashe
text:
We have a 18 month old French Bulldog, who has a very sensitive stomach. We had enormous problems trying to find her a high quality food that didn't result in ongoing vomiting, even with foods recommended by the Vet.
Thankfully Orijen 6 Fish, has been just brilliant. Our pup loves it, devours it in seconds, and hasn't had any stomach issues since starting it. She's extremely fit and toned as a result of it, combined with daily exercise, and we wouldn't consider giving her anything else as a substitute.
